name: Jurassic Dino Defense 3D
description:
Take part in a fast paced, action-packed dino tower defense extravaganza! Try your hand at quickly placing towers, balancing resources, using eye-hand coordination to maneuver your troops, lasers, machine guns, and cannons into position against invading Pteradactyl, T-Rex, Dilophosaurus and more!

This game features the latest high end rendering techniques, high definition textures, fast framerate, and eye popping user interface, high contrast colors and coherent design across the board.
